Name: Three Quarters Space Station
About the game: Three Quarter Space Station is an immersive VR Amusement Park in the Space, where you can Chat、Hang out, and play wide variety of VR games with your friends， come and join the space VR party ! KEY FEATURES Central Hall：A huge Space Station where you can explore and hang out with friends ！ Casual Game：Whac-a-mole、Basketball shot、Balloon hit，lots of casual games are waiting for challenge！ Game Center：Play amount of different kind of VR games in game center，Action、RPG、Shooting，find all you want！ Special Avatar： Customize and dress up your avatar to express your style！ 3-D Spatialized Audio: Feeling like your conversations happens in real wolrd！
